description: This bake recipe has so many aromatic and smooth textures and is very moorish.
name: Artichoke & Parmesan Bake with Leeks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g artichokes, store bought jar and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Pan fry the leeks in a pan on a medium heat with the canola oil for 2 minutes turning half way through. Drain the artichokes and add them to the pan with the leeks and fry for a further 2 minutes.
Add the butter to the pan and once melted fully and incrementally add the flour. Once full combined, gradually add the milk and cream while stirring.
Cook this out for a further 10 minutes until the sauce starts to thicken. Remove the ingredients from the pan and transfer to 4 separate gratin dishes.
Sprinkle the breadcrumbs and grated parmesan over the dishes and grill for 2 minutes before serving.
